title: CARTOGRAPHY AND GEOGRAPHIC INFORMATION SYSTEM
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography and any two (2) from Physics, Further Mathematics,

Chemistry, Technical Drawing, Visual Art, Economics or Biology/Agricultural Science.
subjects: Any three (3) from the following Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Geography, Technical Drawing, Biology/Agricultural Science, Economics or Further Mathematics

title: INDUSTRIAL EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.

(ii)   ND lower credit in Civil Engineering, Production/Electrical Engineering.

(iii)    Final City and Guilds or its equivalent plus National Technical Certificate.

(iv) NCE credit  in Technical Education plus 'O' Level credit passes in Physics or Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include Physics or Mathematics.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) other Science subject.

title: PHOTOGRAMMETRY AND REMOTE SENSING
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two (2) from Geography, Further Mathematics, Chemistry, Technical Drawing, Visual Art, Economics or Biology/Agricultural Science.
subjects: Any three (3) from the following: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Geography, Technical Drawing, Biology/Agricultural Science, Economics or Further Mathematics.

title: PSYCHOSOCIAL REHABILITATION
utme_requirements: ‘O’ Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology and any other two (2) subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Biology and Economics, IS or CRS.
